import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { FaUser } from 'react-icons/fa' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Spinner } from '../components/Spinner' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' export const Join = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', passwordConfirm: '' }) const { name, email, password, passwordConfirm } = formData const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const { user, isError, isSuccess, isLoading, message } = useSelector((state) => state.auth) useEffect(() => { if (isError) { toast.error(message) } if (isSuccess || user) { navigate('/') } dispatch(reset()) }, []) const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } const onChange = (e) => { setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value })) } return ( <>
